summary: This is a lore friendly race mod that adds Shadowscales to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][u][color=#000000][size=6][i]Shadowscales Race Mod[/i][/size][/color]
[/u][/font][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#999999][size=2][b]This is a very lore friendly mod that adds a Shadowscale race to the game.[/b][/size][/color]

[/font]
[color=#ff0000][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][u][b]Attributes
[/b][/u][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[b]+10 Sneak
+5 One Handed
+5 Alchemy
+5 Smithing
+5 Archery
+5 Light Armor
[/b][/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS]70 Health
110 Stamina (regenerates slightly faster)
50 Magicka (regenerates slightly slower)[/font][/b]
[/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700]Lore

[/color][color=#ff7700][size=2][b]Shadowscales are Argonians born under the sign of The Shadow, and raised by the dark brotherhood. They go through rigorous training for years and years, until they are the perfect assassin. They are believed to be extinct, however there are still some left.[/b][/size]

[/color][u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Description
[/size][/color][/u][color=#00ff00][b]
Argonians born under the sign of The Shadow, also known as Shadowscales, have been trained to kill. They have gone through rigorous training that has kept them fast and light on their feet. Although they may not be that skilled at magic, they have learned to pack a punch. They have not yet adapted to the blizzards of Skyrim, but they have learned to resist fire and shock.

[/b][/color][b][u][color=#ffff00][size=5]Abilities
[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]Torture Training- Resist Shock (15%)[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Torture Training- Resist Fire (15%)[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Brittle Scales- Weakness to frost (40%)[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Powerful Fist- Higher Unarmed Damage (15)[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Argonian Lungs- Waterbreathing[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Stamina Regenerates faster[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Magicka Regenerates slower[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Resist Disease (50%)[/color]

[b][size=6][u][i]Credit to Hati13 for the idea[/i][/u][/size][/b]
[/font][/b]
author: uriah12g
